Tristan Thompson

Tristan Trevor James Thompson ▪ Instagram: realtristan13

(Double T)

Position: Center and Power Forward ▪ Shoots: Left Right

6-9, 254lb (206cm, 115kg)

Team: Cleveland Cavaliers

Born: March 13, 1991 in Toronto, Ontario ca

College: Texas

High School: Findlay Prep in Henderson, Nevada

Recruiting Rank: 2010 (9)

Draft: Cleveland Cavaliers, 1st round (4th pick, 4th overall), 2011 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: December 26, 2011

Experience: 13 years
